text: The women's 400 metres hurdles event at the 2002 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Kingston, Jamaica, at National Stadium on 17 and 19 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Lashinda Demus ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Melaine Walker ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Camille Robinson ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 19 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !! title: 2002 World Junior Championships in Athletics – Women's 400 metres hurdles
